title: Passwordless OTP Authentication - Successful Login
description: Verify that a user can successfully authenticate using a valid email and correct OTP code.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter a registered valid email address
Request OTP code
Enter the correct OTP code received via email
Submit the OTP code
Verify user is successfully logged in and redirected to appropriate dashboard

title: Passwordless OTP Authentication - Login with Mock OTP for Test Domain
description: Verify login works for emails ending with @example.com using the fixed mock OTP 123456.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter a valid email address ending with @example.com
Request OTP code
Enter the mock OTP code 123456
Submit the OTP code
Verify user is successfully logged in without receiving real OTP email

title: Passwordless OTP Authentication - Incorrect OTP
description: Ensure login fails when the user enters an incorrect OTP code.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter a registered valid email address
Request OTP code
Enter an incorrect OTP code
Submit the OTP code
Verify login is denied and appropriate error message is shown

title: Dual Dashboards - Operator View Data Accuracy
description: Verify that the Operator dashboard correctly displays global statistics, product lists, orders, and operator wallet balance.

steps.description: Login as a Shadow Operator
Navigate to the Operator dashboard
Verify global stats are correctly calculated and displayed
Verify list of products managed by Operator is correctly displayed
Verify orders associated with Operator’s products are listed accurately
Verify wallet balance matches expected funds

title: Dual Dashboards - Creator View Data Accuracy
description: Verify that the Creator dashboard correctly displays personal sales, product lists, orders, and wallet information.

steps.description: Login as a Creator user
Navigate to the Creator dashboard
Verify the list of products created by the Creator is displayed correctly
Verify sales and order records related to Creator’s products are accurate
Verify wallet balance and transaction history are accurate

title: Product Creation with Digital Asset Upload
description: Validate successful creation of a new product including uploading images or files to Supabase Storage.

steps.description: Login as an Operator or Creator with product management rights
Navigate to product creation page
Fill in product details form with valid inputs
Upload valid image or digital asset files
Submit product creation form
Verify product is saved successfully and appears on product list
Verify uploaded media files are present and accessible in Supabase Storage

title: Product Editing and Media Replacement
description: Verify that product editing works correctly including updating media files and saving changes.

steps.description: Login as product owner
Navigate to specific product edit page
Modify product details and upload new media files
Save changes
Verify updated product details are reflected correctly
Verify new media replaces or is added correctly in Supabase Storage

title: Landing Page Rendering and UI Components
description: Check that the landing page loads correctly and all UI components such as hero section, search bar with live suggestions, trending products, and category grid with video backgrounds are displayed properly.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page
Verify hero section is displayed with correct text and visuals
Verify search bar is present and functional
Verify live search suggestions appear as user types
Verify trending products section shows correct product data
Verify category grid displays videos as background correctly

title: Discover & Search - Live Suggestions Accuracy and Performance
description: Validate the discover and search page returns relevant live product suggestions with minimal latency as user types in the search bar.

steps.description: Navigate to Discover or Search page
Type a partial product name or keyword in the search bar
Verify live search suggestions appear and are relevant to the input
Verify search suggestions load within acceptable latency thresholds

title: Order Processing and Automatic Revenue Split
description: Ensure that purchasing an order properly processes payment and splits revenue automatically between Operator and Creator wallets as per configured percentages.

steps.description: Login as customer
Browse and select a product linked to an Operator and Creator with known revenue split
Complete the purchase following checkout process
Verify order is recorded and payment is confirmed
Verify Operator’s wallet balance updates with correct revenue share
Verify Creator’s wallet balance updates with correct revenue share
Verify transaction histories are updated accurately for both parties

title: Wallet Transaction History Completeness
description: Verify that all financial activities including sales income and withdrawals are reflected comprehensively and accurately in the wallet transaction history.

steps.description: Login as Operator or Creator with wallet activity
Navigate to wallet transaction history page
Verify all transactions from sales, revenue splits, deposits, and withdrawals are listed
Verify transaction timestamps, amounts, and descriptions are correct

title: Wallet Withdrawal Request Flow
description: Validate that users can successfully submit withdrawal requests and that wallet balances and transaction histories reflect the withdrawal.

steps.description: Login as Operator or Creator
Navigate to wallet withdrawal request page
Submit a valid withdrawal request with amount less than or equal to wallet balance
Verify withdrawal request is recorded successfully
Verify wallet balance is reduced accordingly
Verify transaction history shows the withdrawal entry

title: Route Protection Middleware - Unauthorized Access
description: Ensure that the middleware correctly blocks access to protected routes for unauthenticated users.

steps.description: Attempt to access a protected dashboard or management route without logging in
Verify access is denied and user is redirected to login page

title: Route Protection Middleware - Session Integrity for Authenticated User
description: Verify that authenticated users maintain session integrity and can access protected routes without interruption.

steps.description: Login successfully
Navigate to various protected routes such as dashboards, product management, and wallet
Verify all requested pages load correctly without redirection

title: Middleware Rate Limiting Disabled Behavior
description: Validate that the rate limiting middleware is currently disabled and does not restrict normal API/request traffic.

steps.description: Make multiple rapid requests to controlled API endpoints
Verify that no requests are blocked or rate limited

title: Sell Page Rendering and CTA Functionality
description: Check that the marketing Sell page loads correctly with hero section, benefits, testimonials, FAQ, and functioning CTA buttons.

steps.description: Navigate to the Sell page
Verify the hero section displays correct marketing content
Verify benefits section lists key platform advantages
Verify testimonials section displays reviews correctly
Verify FAQ section is present with collapsible answers
Click CTA buttons to sign up
Verify user is navigated to signup/login page

title: Search Suggestions - Edge Case Nonexistent Query
description: Validate the behavior of live search suggestions when user inputs query with no matching products.

steps.description: Navigate to search bar
Enter a random string or nonexistent product name
Verify no suggestions are shown and UI handles empty state smoothly

title: Product Management - Invalid Media Upload Handling
description: Ensure the product creation/editing workflow handles invalid media file uploads gracefully with proper error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to product creation or editing page
Attempt to upload an unsupported or corrupted media file
Verify system rejects the file and displays appropriate error message
Attempt to submit the form after invalid upload
Verify submission is blocked until a valid file is uploaded

title: Order Processing - Insufficient Payment Handling
description: Verify that orders fail gracefully if payment processing is incomplete or insufficient.

steps.description: Initiate purchase and simulate payment failure or insufficient funds
Verify order is not confirmed
Verify user sees a meaningful error message
Verify wallet balances remain unchanged
